comparison.description: Determines how the experience level of the player should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the experience level of the player should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the experience level of the player will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the experience level of the player will be compared to.

type.description:
## XP Levels

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/xp_levels)

Checks the current experience level of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:xp_levels`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__



---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:xp_levels",
    "comparison": "<=",
    "compare_to": 5
}
```

This example will check if the player has 5 levels or less.
